name: Detoxify
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Adventurer's Guide © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: You remove a creature's ability to poison others, whether inherent or via poisoned weapons. Whenever an affected creature would inflict poison with an attack, spell, or other method (including auras and other constant methods), that poison is automatically neutralized. This does not grant the subject of the spell any resistance to poison itself.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（一株蒲公英的茎秆）
text_zh: 你可以移除一个生物的毒素能力，无论是天生能力或是涂毒武器。一个受影响的生物通过攻击，法术或是其他手段（包括光环或是恒定效果）生成的任何毒素效果都会被中和。这个法术不会赋予任何的毒素抗力。
